item.title: Staff
item.description: Staff PonyFest Online could not have existed without the tireless (and frantic!) work of the following: B.B. - Tabletop Gaming Dawnfire - Mascot Design Dexanth - Lead Facilitator Fizzbuzz - Video Room Katharine - Web Development Kevin - Social Media Lead Kibbie - Social Media Memeposter Larcis - A/V / Streaming Ruef - Vendor Manager Screw Loose - Design Lead Simul - Events / Scheduling
